verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: greek chicken dinner] i got this recipe from my sister and my family really likes it a lot it makes the house smell so good the amount of garlic might seem high but it just right you get every bit of the flavor without overpowering the other ingredients —terri christensen montague michigan cook chicken
